statements: DELETE FROM CommunicationLogs WHERE responder_id = 100 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM CommunicationLogs WHERE log_id = 5 AND responder_id = 10
DELETE FROM CommunicationLogs WHERE timestamp < '2021-01-01' AND message LIKE '%error%'
DELETE FROM responders WHERE role = 'Paramedic' AND contact_number = '+123456789';
DELETE FROM crisis_events WHERE event_name = 'Earthquake Disaster';
DELETE FROM communication_logs WHERE responder_id = 3 AND situation_id = 5;
DELETE FROM responder_locations WHERE location = 'City Center' AND last_updated < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM message_recipients WHERE responder_id = 3 AND message_id = 5;
